definition: A person who observes an event or activity, typically used to refer to someone who watches a performance, sports game, or any public gathering.

examples.german: Die Zuschauer jubelten dem Gewinner zu.
examples.english: The spectators cheered for the winner.

examples.german: Der Zuschauer verfolgte gespannt das Spiel.
examples.english: The viewer watched the game eagerly.

examples.german: Die Zuschauer waren von der Vorstellung begeistert.
examples.english: The audience was thrilled by the performance.
